item.title: Placeholder1
item.description:
Here’s where I explain stuff like $|\psi\rangle = \alpha|0\rangle + \beta|1\rangle$ in plain language.

This blog supports inline $\LaTeX$ with KaTeX! You can also do: $$ \langle 0 | 1 \rangle = 0 $$ which shows math in display mode.
